item.title: Sparkle under the moonlight during an afternoon tea in Hong Kong this September
item.description:
Source: The Langham, Hong Kong. The Twinkle in the Moonlight Afternoon Tea set. The Langham Hotel in Hong Kong is celebrating the Mid-Autumn Festival with a special afternoon tea inspired by Eastern flavors. Offered throughout September at the hotel’s Palm Court restaurant, the menu, created by Executive Pastry Chef David Puig, features treats like “The Moon,” a lychee and raspberry mousse cake decorated with a galaxy glaze. This dessert also includes rose essence, Sacher sponge cake, and a golden crescent moon topping...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/sparkle-under-the-moonlight-during-an-afternoon-tea-in-hong-kong-this-september/

item.title: The Mandarin Oriental in Hong Kong and Vistajet provide a rare and unique experience called Once in a Blue Moon
item.description:
VistaJet, a prominent business aviation company, has partnered with the Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong to create the “Once in a Blue Moon” experience. This exclusive offer celebrates the Mid-Autumn Festival with a luxurious private jet journey featuring an in-flight menu designed by Chef Wong, the Executive Chinese Chef of the Michelin-starred Man Wah restaurant at the Mandarin Oriental. Available from September 15 to October 15, 2020, this unique offering features a customized private jet experience departing from Hong Kong...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-mandarin-oriental-in-hong-kong-and-vistajet-provide-a-rare-and-unique-experience-called-once-in-a-blue-moon/

item.title: Crowne Plaza Changi Airport is offering mooncakes in a suitcase
item.description:
Crowne Plaza Changi Airport has launched its 2016 mooncake collection, featuring classic baked and contemporary snowskin varieties. These halal-certified treats are packaged in a stylish metal suitcase, making them a great gift for colleagues or loved ones. For those who prefer a traditional taste, baked mooncakes are available in three flavors: White Lotus Paste with Double Egg Yolk, White Lotus Paste with Single Egg Yolk, and White Lotus Paste with Melon Seeds...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/crowne-plaza-changi-airport-is-offering-mooncakes-in-a-suitcase/
